lyric:
[00:00.000] 作曲 : Dredg
[00:19.62]I was looking down at you smiling up at me.
[00:24.75]For once I held you tight, but the shadow hands grabbed at me.
[00:29.57]Your head was in the clouds, now those clouds are on your head.
[00:35.00]It's when you needed me, so I listened to what you said.
[00:40.08]Looking another year went by
[00:43.94]They keep passing by
[00:46.93]But damn I didn't even die.
[00:49.43]To hold it so I've grown
[00:53.75]I fought time but lost.
[01:11.28]It was love like a callous you scarred enough to be.
[01:16.81]Tough and immune, your body adapts you see.
[01:21.12]To all above my head, and all below my feet.
[01:27.06]No that's one freedom you'll never take from me.
[01:32.04]Look another year went by
[01:35.79]They keep passing by
[01:38.79]But damn I didn't even die
[01:41.33]To hold it so I've grown
[01:45.64]I fought time but lost
[01:53.60]To criticize and judge
[01:58.58]How did I end up here
[02:03.13]With these standards I'm forced to love
[02:08.32]make me disappear
[02:12.40]hold tight
[02:15.11]hold tight
[02:35.41]To criticize and judge
[02:40.39]how did I end up here
[02:44.95]（hold tight)with these standards I'm forced to love
[02:50.18]make me disappear
[02:55.14]To criticize and judge
[03:00.18]how did I end up here
[03:04.70]with these standards I'm forced to love
[03:09.88]make me disappear
[03:14.64]hold tight
[03:20.50]hold tight
[03:23.50]look another year went by
[03:26.54]hold tight
[03:28.26]hold tight
tlyric:
[by:卡亚普酱]
[00:19.62]我深情的望着你上扬的嘴角
[00:24.75]曾经我将你紧拥，黑暗的魔抓却将你我分离
[00:29.57]你曾无尽遐想，如今却如幻想般天马行空
[00:35.00]当你有需要的时候，我会仔细来倾听
[00:40.08]一年就这样过去了
[00:43.94]年复一年
[00:46.93]而我却TM活在这里
[00:49.43]太老了，活得太累了
[00:53.75]在与时间的较量中败下阵来
[01:11.28]早已伤痕累累，爱也不愿再提
[01:16.81]身体产生免疫，内心也早已看清
[01:21.12]所有我的头上与脚下的一切
[01:27.06]都知道我的这份自由你永远都无法夺去
[01:32.04]一年就这样过去了
[01:35.79]年复一年
[01:38.79]而我却TM活在这里
[01:41.33]太老了，活得太累了
[01:45.64]在与时间的较量中败下阵来
[01:53.60]那些断言和非议
[01:58.58]让我无所适从
[02:03.13]带着标准被动去爱
[02:08.32]让我迷失了自己
[02:12.40]不应放弃
[02:15.11]不应放弃
[02:35.41]那些断言和非议
[02:40.39]让我无所适从
[02:44.95]（不应放弃）带着标准被动去爱
[02:50.18]最后失去了自我
[02:55.14]那些断言和非议
[03:00.18]让我无所适从
[03:04.70]带着标准被动去爱
[03:09.88]让我迷失了自己
[03:14.64]不应放弃
[03:20.50]不应放弃
[03:23.50]一年就这样过去了
[03:26.54]不应放弃
[03:28.26]不应放弃
